Gerhard Marx (amụrụ n'afọ 1976) bụ onye na-ese ihe na South Africa.

A mụrụ ya n'afọ 1976, ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ wee nweta nzere masta ya na Fine Arts cum laude na Mahadum Cape Town n'afọ 2004.  Ya na ndị omenkà a ma ama dịka William Kentridge na Handspring Puppet Company arụwo ọrụ.
Ọ na-akụzi ugbu a na Mahadum nke Witwatersrand, na Johannesburg.

Dị ka Art News South Africa nke Eprel 2006 si kwuo, Marx tụlere imalite ikpe megide BMW n'oge na-adịghị anya mgbe mkpọsa mgbasa ozi nke ụlọ ọrụ Ireland-Davenport mepụtara na-ekwu na ọ mebiri ikike nwebisiinka ya. Art News South Africa mepụtara ihe mgbasa ozi na-ese okwu nke e wepụrụ na mgbasa ozi mgbe obere oge gasịrị, na nso nso nke ọrụ Marx
Onye nnọchi anya ya, Warren Siebrits ekwuputala na Machị 2006 na onye ọka iwu ikike nwebisiinka bụ Owen Dean ga-anọchite anya Marx, nke a maara nke ọma maka ikpe Lion Sleeps Tonight.
